projects.title: Nomnoms
projects.description: Cozy cookie brand website focused on storytelling, product highlights, and warm visual design.

projects.title: Cozy Stayins - Baguio
projects.description: Transient house booking site built for clarity, trust, and easy access to essential property details.

projects.title: Travel Flyer Design
projects.description: This travel flyer promotes a Hong Kong & Disneyland tour as a reward for meeting sales goals at Forticare Health Systems International. It outlines the qualification requirements for Health Specialists, Branch Managers, and Regional Managers in both the Regular and Operator Distribution Channels. The promotion runs from January to December 2024, with the travel period in April 2024. The flyer features vibrant visuals and details the cash brought-in requirements for eligibility.

projects.title: Rewarding Consistency: The Forticare Persistency Bonus
projects.description: This flyer showcases Forticare’s Persistency Bonus Program, rewarding consistent performance through three stages — Opener, Hot Shooter, and Clincher — with cash bonuses for renewals. Completing all three earns an extra ₱1,500. The design highlights motivation, teamwork, and performance excellence.

projects.title: Creative Design Template
projects.description: A versatile Canva template created to help brands communicate clearly and stand out online. Easy to customize and suitable for marketing, announcements, and promotions.
